Package anip

Class Summary
Anip Main class of the anip video codec-player program.
APDecoder Decoder for AP-format video files.
APEncoder Encoder for AP-format video files.
Bitmap Represents bitmap images.
BMPFile BMP file input and output handling.
ByteIO Conversions between integer - byte array and signed - unsigned byte values.
Sleeper In-thread delayer that calls java.lang.Thread.sleep() manually after every working perioid trying to keep durations of cycles consisting of a working and a sleeping perioid equal.
